metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31615 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause anull-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.
